mapper.sql: id, menu_name, parent_id, menu_type, path, component, permission, icon, sort_order, visible, status, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, deleted, remark
mapper.select: SELECT FROM sys_menu WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0
SELECT FROM sys_menu WHERE permission = #{permission} AND deleted = 0
SELECT FROM sys_menu WHERE deleted = 0 AND status = 1 ORDER BY parent_id ASC, sort_order ASC, create_time ASC
SELECT FROM sys_menu WHERE deleted = 0 AND status = 1 AND parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY sort_order ASC, create_time ASC

SELECT m. FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id WHERE m.deleted = 0 AND m.status = 1 AND rm.deleted = 0 AND rm.role_id = #{roleId} ORDER BY m.parent_id ASC, m.sort_order ASC, m.create_time ASC

SELECT DISTINCT m. FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE m.deleted = 0 AND m.status = 1 AND m.visible = 1 AND rm.deleted = 0 AND ur.deleted = 0 AND ur.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY m.parent_id ASC, m.sort_order ASC, m.create_time ASC

SELECT DISTINCT m.permission FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE m.deleted = 0 AND m.status = 1 AND m.permission IS NOT NULL AND m.permission != '' AND rm.deleted = 0 AND ur.deleted = 0 AND ur.user_id = #{userId}
